name: Flower Vision
description:
Florida Poly Game Jam 2020

Shelby Garner

Isabela Rangel

A mini adventure/story game. You wake up as a faerie trapped inside an elven system of caves and you need to escape. When you find a crack in the wall and see that outside looks so dark, the elves are sure to be blamed. So you seek out to fix the forest and drive the elves out... only to find out that maybe they were not the ones responsible for destroying the forest?! As a woods faerie, it's your duty to save the forest! Do what you gotta do.

All assets and animations were created this weekend. This was a very long weekend. 

Story coming soon if we get to nap.
